meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Heidi McEchron Fran Altomare Neal Pollack Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6674.

td.p: Heidi McEchron, a painter and parodist from Iowa City, Iowa
Fran Altomare, a tutor and adjunct professor originally from Quakertown, Pennsylvania
Neal Pollack, a writer from Austin, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $45,999)

tr.td: WELL-PLAYED, WELL-PAID
A STORIED FORECAST
ONE LOVE
ONE "HEART"
LET'S GET TOGETHER
& FEEL ALL RIGHT
